reviews.title: Perfect fit and sizing!
reviews.content: I was worried about the sizing but this dress fits perfectly. The size chart was accurate and the material is comfortable. Great quality for the price.

reviews.title: Good quality, runs a bit small
reviews.content: The quality is excellent but I would recommend sizing up. The fabric is beautiful and the fit is nice, just a bit tighter than expected.

reviews.title: Sizing is inconsistent
reviews.content: I ordered my usual size but it was too small. The customer service was helpful with the exchange, but the sizing information could be clearer.

reviews.title: True to size and comfortable
reviews.content: This fits exactly as expected. The sizing chart was spot on and the material is so comfortable. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Poor sizing information
reviews.content: The sizing guide was confusing and the item didn't fit as described. I had to return it because it was too large despite following their size chart.
